text: is a railway station on the Sōya Main Line in Monponai, Bifuka, Hokkaido, Japan, operated by the Hokkaido Railway Company (JR Hokkaido). ==Lines served== Momponai Station is served by the Sōya Main Line. ==Station layout== The station is unstaffed, and consists of a basic waiting room with toilet facilities. ==Adjacent stations== ==History== Momponai Station opened on 3 November 1911. ==Surrounding area== * National Route 40 * Teshio River * ==References== ==External links== * Momponai Station information (JR Hokkaido) Category:Railway stations in Hokkaido Prefecture Category:Railway stations in Japan opened in 1911
title: Momponai Station
